name: abrestan Accounting
author: KTE

sections.description:
This plugin helps connect your (online) store to abrestan online accounting software. By using this plugin, saving products, contacts, and orders in your store will also save them automatically in your abrestan account. Besides that, just after a client pays a bill, the receipt document will be stored in abrestan as well. Of course, you have to register your account in abrestan first. To do so, visit abrestan at the link here www.abrestan.com and sign up for free. After you signed up and entered your account, choose your business, then in the settings menu/API, you can find the API keys for the business and import them to the plugin settings. Now your module is ready to use.

For more information and a full guide to how to use abrestan and WooCommerce Plugin, visit abrestan’s website and go to the “Accounting School” menu.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/abrestan directory, or install the abrestan plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->abrestan screen to configure the plugin

short_description: Connect abrestan Online Accounting to WooCommerce.

upgrade_notice: Automatic updates should work smoothly, but we still recommend you back up your site.
